str2: (a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pierce through (or deeply), transfix. From ek and the base of kentron; to transfix.
